tag_list: james-allen-johnson, technology-writer, indyposted-com, blogger, problogger, seo-writer
overview:
James Allen Johnson is the founder of SocialNewsDaily, a news reporting website that focuses on the social media space. SND as it is commonly referred by is a Google News featured web property that focuses on social media, social business, social good, social celebrities, social mobile platforms, social games and other areas of the social space.

before founding SocialNews Daily he founded IndyPosted.com an independent online blog/newspaper that focuses on Technology, Entertainment, Sports, Politics and General News stories of every variety. He also operates the newly launched SocialNewsDaily.com which offers a daily mix (7 days a week) of social media and social network news.

James also owns the newly launched OddFunny.com which provides users with funny and odd videos, pictures and news from around the world.

James also acts as the senior editor for Inquisitr.com where he has served for the last two years under former Tech Crunch writer Duncan Riley and now under the websites new owner. Inquisitr.com currently receive more than 10 million unique monthly users and more than 15 million pageviews.

James also serves as a social media writer for BlogHerald.com and has written pieces for Forevergeek.com (A SplashPressMedia company), PhoneDog.com and GearCrave.com and TechBeat.com

James also served for 18 months as the Managing Editor of the Mobile channels at Brighthub.com where he focused on Symbian, Blackberry, Google Android, Palm Pre, Windows Mobile and Emerging Technologies. He was also a contributing editor for the personal finance and web development channels.

James is also the owner and co-founder of WriterAssignments.com, a writer clearinghouse that currently employs more than 50 writers who complete more than 3000 articles per month for various clients around the world.

Along with his current positions he is a freelance writer/editor for hire focusing on the Social Media, SEO and Technology.

milestones.description: Indyposted.com passes 5,000 posts and 300,000 pageviews per month with a 25% per month growth rate.
Indyposted.com surpasses 7,000 posts. Reaches over 500,000 pageviews per month
